Title: Getting a List of Top Defacers/ Hacked Websites
Description:
A quick demonstration of how to use the Shodan command-line utility to get a list of websites that have recently been hacked and aggregate the results to generate a Top 10 Website Defacers. Part of an on-going article series on hacked websites:

https://blog.shodan.io/top-website-defacers-june-2015/
